availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred E. Robb (Lyon County, Kentucky, saddler)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, saddler. Tennessee native. Married to Celina Elmira Paine Robb in Montgomery County, Tennessee, on January 14, 1857. Father of Mary A. Robb. Saddler in Montgomery County in 1850. Saddler in Eddyville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Montgomery County, p. 228B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 768-69
Tennessee State Marriages, 1778-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, Montgomery County Marriages, p. 41.
